name: unfinished nonogram idle
description:
An early version of a game that combines nonogram drawing with idle elements. Complete nonograms to earn points and purchase more nonograms and auto completion upgrades. Draw sequences of nonograms to unlock hidden bonuses.

🕹️ Controls

Left click : Draw

Right click : Erase

🖥️ Source Code

https://github.com/marschium/nonogram-idle
